message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90%, you take 10%.  We can adjust later if you want, but it's better to get something than nothing!
I'm not getting 10% of nothing. I'll give you a better offer, but you have to meet me in the middle.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you everything. I'm offering you 400000, which is more than your previous offer. Let's be reasonable and agree.
You're not giving me much. I'll give you 400000, but I want 600000. Let's meet in the middle, like you said.
